file_content.text: Thank you for listening, sir.
Sergeant! Sergeant? Excuse me, Sergeant?
Uh, sir, could I please speak to you for a moment? Please? Sir?
Go right ahead, Private. I have some time.
Of course.
What is it this time, Farn?
You again?
I'm very sorry to bother you, sir, but you're the only person I could think to go to.
Not now, Private.
Please, sir, it's very important! You're the only person I could think to go to.
All of the other officers I've met here are completely corrupt--all but you, sir. I know I can trust you.
I appreciate your trust, Private. Now, speak freely--what's this all about?
That means a lot to me.
Okay, start talking.
Don't shine me on, Private.
It's my CO, Lieutenant Virk. He's scamming everyone in his command, and nobody does anything about it.
Virk forces all of us to kick up to him to get safe postings. Credits, weapons, stuff we confiscate from the seps, everything.
If you don't play along, Virk assigns you to the most dangerous patrol routes on the island. It's like a death sentence.
Corrupt officers give us all a bad name. Someone should report this guy.
Virk is extorting his own men?
My buddy tried to report him. The next day he disappeared to Talloran, and the day after that, he came back in a box.
You knew the risks when you enlisted, Private.
Army life is dangerous.
Beg your pardon, sir, but I enlisted in the Republic Army--not some gang of mercenaries killing for credits.
Not my problem, Farn.
You're in Havoc Squad, sir--you're important. You could talk to someone who matters.
I'll inform my superiors about Lieutenant Virk's activities immediately, Private.
I'd be glad to help.
We'll see if I have time.
You--you will? Thank you so much. You are so... wow! Sir, you are amazing.
Thank you, sir! So much! I really appreciate this--I do.
No problem.
I really appreciate it, sir! Thanks again!
If that's everything, Private, you're dismissed. Stay safe out there.
Let's get back to work.
Get back to your duties, Farn.
Just go.
Yes, sir! Thanks again, sir!
I've got my own missions to deal with--complain to someone else.
I've heard enough.
But, but... yes, sir, Sergeant. Th--thank you for your time.
Go buy yourself a safe posting, kid.
Here, take some credits.
Seriously? Thank you so much! You've saved my life. I'll see you later!
Hopefully someone else can be of assistance to you, Private. You're dismissed.
Sorry I wasn't able to help.
Remember, a tough mission makes a tough soldier.
Extra combat will do you good.
Y--yes, sir. Goodbye, sir.
You'd better not annoy me with any more of your problems, Farn.
Don't bother me again.
Uh, y--yes, sir. I understand.
I hope I see you again later.
Excuse me, Sergeant? Uh, sorry to interrupt, but you're the new member of Havoc Squad, aren't you?
What can I do for you, Private?
Yes, that's right.
Is there a problem?
Oh, uh, no, sir, no! Nothing wrong at all.
I'm busy, soldier. What do you want?
Make this quick.
I'm Farn, sir, Private Farn. It's a real honor to meet you! Ord Mantell is my first post--I can't believe I'm here at the same time as Havoc Squad!
And you're so... or, wha--what I mean to say is, uh, sir, is that I wasn't expecting you to be a woman, sir. Ma'am. Sergeant.
You don't have any other female officers here on Ord Mantell, Private?
Are women uncommon here?
Oh, uh, no, sir, it's not that. You're just so... uh, I mean... nevermind.
Do you have an issue with female officers, Private?
Is that a problem for you?
No! No, no, no, of course not, Sergeant! It's just that you're so... uh, what I mean is... uh, nevermind.
I know it's a lot to take in. Just try to stay calm.
Don't get too excited, Farn.
Uh, yes, sir, Sergeant, sir. Sorry.
If, uh, if you don't mind me asking, sir, what's your mission here? Why would Havoc Squad be sent to Ord Mantell?
The separatists stole a Republic bomb, so we're here to take it back.
We're tracking down a bomb.
Whoa. Sounds like dangerous stuff.
We're Special Forces, Private. I can't really discuss our missions.
I shouldn't talk about it.
Of--of course, sir. Right. I understand. Top secret stuff.
I'm sure not here to answer stupid questions.
You're wasting my time.
Oh, uh, yes, sir. Sorry, sir.
I, uh, I won't take up any more of your time, Sergeant. I'm sure you have lots of really important things to do.
You're dismissed, Private.
Very well.
Goodbye, sir!
Maybe we'll run into each other again, Private.
See you later.
I hope so, sir! Goodbye!
Get lost.
Beat it, kid.
Uh, yes, sir! Right away, sir!
Good luck in your mission, sir.
It was a pleasure to meet you, Sergeant.
Good day.
